医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ELRIG 英国成立参与战略工作组英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 今天宣布成立其参与战略工作组 (ESWG)。该组织旨在改善科学项目的获取并发展 ELRIG 社区https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/ELRIG-UK-Establishes-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/ELRIG-UK-Establishes-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c548d59a-9d48-45ad-b77f-c3bfd341c9b1 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 05:11:00 -0400
灵活的空间生物学解决方案，可在两天内实现高达 8 重的扩增：CST 推出 SignalStar™ 多重 IHC Cell Signaling Technology (CST) 是一家生命科学发现技术公司，也是抗体、试剂盒和服务的领先供应商，今天宣布推出其 SignalStar Multiplex IHC 技术，这是一种革命性的新工具，用于空间生物学研究，使用中重、高通量进行空间生物学研究。通量免疫组织化学 (IHC) 测定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Flexible-Spatial-Biology-Solution-for-Up-to-8-Plex-Amplification-in-Two-Days-CST-Launches-SignalStare284a2-Multiplex-免疫组织化学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Flexible-Spatial-Biology-Solution-for-Up-to-8-Plex-Amplification-in-Two-Days-CST-Launches-SignalStare284a2-Multiplex- IHC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f81b0b9-d2f6-4bce-8b1f-12cc0e9877fc Thu, 14 Sep 2023 04:18:00 -0400 Flexible Spatial Biology Solution for Up to 8-Plex Amplification in Two Days: CST Launches SignalStar™ Multiplex IHC
Omicron 感染后长期感染新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 的风险显着降低感染 Omicron 变种后患上长期新冠病毒的风险明显低于感染早期冠状病毒变种后的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Long-COVID-risk-found-to-be-significantly-lower-following-Omicron-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Long-COVID-risk-found-to-be-significantly-lower-following-Omicron-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13275221-f449-459b-9992-673bcd1873bb Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:56:00 -0400 Long COVID risk found to be significantly lower following Omicron infection
AACR 癌症进展报告提供癌症研究和治疗的最新统计数据今天，美国癌症研究协会 (AACR) 发布了第 13 版年度癌症进展报告，该报告记录了基础、转化和临床癌症研究以及与癌症相关的人口科学如何在国家研究所的联邦投资的支持下进行卫生署 (NIH) 和国家癌症研究所 (NCI) - 对于改善健康和拯救生命仍然至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AACR-Cancer-Progress-Report-provides-latest-statistics-on-cancer-research-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AACR-Cancer-Progress-Report-provides-latest-statistics-on-cancer-research-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a732f6e-71e8-4da5-8fd1-50dfa7811105 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:50:00 -0400 AACR Cancer Progress Report provides latest statistics on cancer research and treatment
口服 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗在猴子身上显示出希望牛津大学出版社在《生物学方法和方案》上发表的一篇新论文指出，研究 SARS-CoV-2 的研究人员可能已经开发出口服疫苗的新方法，这种方法不仅更容易给药，而且在对抗疾病方面更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Oral-SARS-CoV-2-vaccine-shows-promise-in-monkeys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Oral-SARS-CoV-2-vaccine-shows-promise-in-monkeys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58e6fa80-d7a3-4624-a7a7-b7fd3c05d975 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:33:26 -0400 Oral SARS-CoV-2 vaccine shows promise in monkeys
粮食不安全如何促进弱势儿童的含糖饮料消费纽约市的新研究表明，食品安全水平低的家庭中的儿童更有可能消费含糖饮料（SSB）。研究发现，慢性压力和美国父母移民身份等因素加剧了这些儿童的粮食不安全与较高的 SSB 消费之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/How-food-insecurity-fuels-sugary-drink-conspiration-in-vulnerable-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/How-food-insecurity-fuels-sugary-drink-conspiration-in-vulnerable-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7015060b-bb05-4f2a-9ba0-5508f49e2d20 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:27:00 -0400 How food insecurity fuels sugary drink consumption in vulnerable kids
COVID-19 使高危儿童出现早期 1 型糖尿病症状的风险增加一倍《美国医学会杂志》的新研究发现，在有遗传倾向的婴儿中，SARS-CoV-2 感染与胰岛自身免疫（1 型糖尿病的前兆）的发生之间存在时间关联。该研究强调，COVID-19 是幼儿患这种糖尿病的潜在危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/COVID-19-doubles-risk-of-early-type-1-diabetes-signs-in-high-risk-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/COVID-19-doubles-risk-of-early-type-1-diabetes-signs-in-high-risk-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3102e81f-e9a0-43c7-bd14-20abacd977f3 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:17:00 -0400 COVID-19 doubles risk of early type 1 diabetes signs in high-risk children
九年研究揭示脂质在衰老、健康和疾病中的关键作用这项为期九年的开创性研究使用先进的质谱分析人类血浆中的脂质谱，揭示与衰老、胰岛素抵抗和病毒感染相关的动态变化。研究结果表明，特定的脂质亚类是人类健康和各种疾病治疗的关键指标和潜在目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Nine-year-study-reveals-lipids-pivotal-role-in-aging-health-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Nine-year-study-reveals-lipids-pivotal-role-in-aging-health-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3893cb2-3fb9-4c94-9337-99a363582838 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 22:45:00 -0400 Nine-year study reveals lipids' pivotal role in aging, health, and disease
Rasip1 基因被发现与血细胞的产生密切相关血液长期以来一直是生命和健康的象征，因此令人惊讶的是，血液生成的某些方面（即造血作用）仍未完全被了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Rasip1-gene-found-to-be-intimately-involved-in-the-creation-of-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Rasip1-gene-found-to-be-intimately-involved-in-the-creation-of-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04abfb1d-ed​​d9-4cb2-8c61-b18537536e1e Wed, 13 Sep 2023 22:34:08 -0400 Rasip1 gene found to be intimately involved in the creation of blood cells
空气污染导致乳腺癌风险激增新研究发现，接触 PM2.5 空气污染每增加 10 µg/m3，女性患乳腺癌的风险就会增加 8%。这项开创性的研究首次提供了将细颗粒物与 ER+ 乳腺癌联系起来的具体证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Air-pollution-fueling-a-spike-in-breast-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Air-pollution-fueling-a-spike-in-breast-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98f0de73-b6ce-427c-a74d-4c76cf432c1f Wed, 13 Sep 2023 22:31:00 -0400 Air pollution fueling a spike in breast cancer risk
